scripts.install:all: concurrently "npm run install:api" "npm run install:bff-login" "npm run install:bff-drawer" "npm run install:bff-videos" "npm run install:main" "npm run install:mf-login" "npm run install:mf-drawer" "npm run install:mf-videos"
scripts.test:all: concurrently "npm run test:api" "npm run test:bff-login" "npm run test:bff-drawer" "npm run test:bff-videos" "npm run test:main" "npm run test:mf-login" "npm run test:mf-drawer" "npm run test:mf-videos"
